description: This is an abstract Java class 'BaseMapper' that provides generic conversion methods between entity objects (E) and Data Transfer Objects (D). It defines abstract methods for individual conversions and concrete methods for bulk conversions between collections, utilizing Java Streams.

classes.name: BaseMapper
classes.description: An abstract generic mapper class providing conversion methods such as convertToEntity and convertToDto for single instances and collections.

methods.name: convertToEntity
methods.description: Abstract method to convert a DTO to an Entity with optional additional parameters.

methods.name: convertToDto
methods.description: Abstract method to convert an Entity to a DTO with optional additional parameters.

methods.name: convertToEntity
methods.description: Concrete method converting a collection of DTOs to Entities.

methods.name: convertToDto
methods.description: Concrete method converting a collection of Entities to DTOs.

methods.name: convertToEntityList
methods.description: Converts a collection of DTOs to a List of Entities.

methods.name: convertToDtoList
methods.description: Converts a collection of Entities to a List of DTOs.

methods.name: convertToEntitySet
methods.description: Converts a collection of DTOs to a Set of Entities.

methods.name: convertToDtoSet
methods.description: Converts a collection of Entities to a Set of DTOs.
